issue.title: [Java] The toString representation is incorrect for unsigned integer vectors
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13792](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13792). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When adding a byte 0xff to a UInt1Vector, the `toString` method produces `[-1]`. Since the vector contains unsinged integers, the correct result should be `[255]`.
